ingredients.item: 6 rashers essential Waitrose Smoked British Bacon Thin Back Rashers, diced

instructions.step: Heat the oil in a large frying pan and fry the onion and bacon for 5 minutes. Add the lentils and stock. Cover and bring to the boil then simmer for 10 minutes.
Remove 4 ladles of the soup and reserve. Purée the remaining soup in the pan with a hand held blender and return the reserved soup to the pan.
Add the parsley and serve with crusty bread.
